description:
Tomozaki makes a new friend, then goes on a shopping trip for Nakamura`s birthday--of all things. Naturally, Hinami turns it into a teaching moment.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Nankan Event Kouryaku Ato ni Nakama ni Naru Chara wa Daitai Nouryokuchi Takai
The Characters Who Become Your Friends After You Clear a Hard Event Usually Have High Stats
難関イベント攻略後に仲間になるキャラはだいたい能力値高い
